::Prowl::

Prowl spins in the air, passing under Triggerhappy. He loved the 
agility of this body. He spins around and fires three laser shots at 
Triggerhappy's wings.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Triggerhappy::
> 
>         Triggerhappy is hit by the missiles, and starts to lose 
altitude,
> but he goes back up, and attempts to ram Prowl.
> 
>           "This better not mess my cockpit windshield!" he joked.
